    • Method Detail

      • newShuffled

        public int[] newShuffled(java.lang.Integer n)
        Generates a new shuffled puzzle. This function of the WS creates a new puzzle shuffle with the standard shuffle function of the Puzzle class and respond to the remote client with the array representation of the puzzle JSONized e.g. "http://ip:port/puzzle/newShuffled?n=4" Returns a puzzle with dimension 4.
        Parameters:
        n - The dimension of the puzzle grid. Should be > 1. (Fetched from url)

      • isSolvable

        public boolean isSolvable(java.lang.String puzzle)
        Verifies if a puzzle is solvable. This function receives a puzzle in an array representation verifies if its solvable using the isSolvable function from puzzle class. e.g. "http://ip:port/puzzle/isSolvable?puzzle=1,7,10,8,0,3,11,2,5,13,12,15,6,9,14,4" Returns true
        Parameters:
        puzzle - The puzzle in array representation (Fetched from url)

      • add

        public int[] add(java.lang.String puzzle)
        Solve the puzzle received This function returns a array with the list of pieces to move to reach the goal state. Uses the aStar function from solver with fitness function manhattanDistance, the faster fitness in our tests.
        Parameters:
        puzzle - The puzzle in array representation (Fetched from url)

      • serveInterface

        public java.io.File serveInterface()
        Shows a graphic WebGUI (Beta this was not finished and it only displays a shuffle puzzle) Function to serve the html resource
        Returns:
        the html file

      • stringToPuzzle

        public Puzzle stringToPuzzle(java.lang.String puzzleStr)
        Function that parse a puzzle from a string This functions receives the string fetched from the URL removes the unwanted characters and returns a clean puzzle.
        Parameters:
        puzzleStr - Puzzle in a string representation with an array like structure
        Returns:
        puzzle created from the string
